Uses of Interface
com.complexible.stardog.api.Connection

  • Packages that use Connection 
    Package Description
    com.complexible.stardog.api
    Provides the core SNARL (Stardog Native API for the RDF Language) classes and interfaces for programmatic access to the Stardog DBMS.
    com.complexible.stardog.api.reasoning
    Provides reasoning connection class for answering queries with reasoning results.
    com.complexible.stardog.api.search
    Provides classes and interfaces for performing free-text search over a Stardog database via the SNARL API.
    com.complexible.stardog.icv.api
    Provides SNARL API bindings for Integrity Constraint Validation (ICV).
    com.complexible.stardog.jena
    Provides classes for Stardog-Jena integration.

      Interface to provide conversion of the 'view' of a connection to another type of connection.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Connection ConnectionConfiguration.at(String theConnectionString)
      Open a connection to the database specified directly by the connection string which may contain connection options

    • Uses of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.api.reasoning

      Subinterfaces of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.api.reasoning 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ReasoningConnection
      SNARL Connection which exposes reasoning specific functionality such as explanations and consistency checking.

    • Uses of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.api.search

      Subinterfaces of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.api.search 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SearchConnection
      Extends the standard SNARL Connection exposing the full-text search support provided by Waldo.

    • Uses of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.icv.api

      Subinterfaces of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.icv.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ICVConnection
      Interface to merge the SNARL Connection API with the standard IC validator so validation can be performed against a connection.
